content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Good afternoon, Emilia. Let's start with a high price, shall we? The price I have in mind is €1,500. Keep in mind, I do not intend to lower this amount significantly, so I hope you are prepared to meet my demands.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite a high price, Mister Schmidt. I'm sure you understand that I'm looking for a fair deal. I'm willing to pay €900.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €900 is far below my expectations. I am willing to negotiate, but I expect a much higher offer. Let's meet in the middle for now, shall we? I propose €1,200.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €1,200 is still quite steep. I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of the apartment. I'll increase my offer to €1,000. This is a fair price for both parties.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €1,000 is still not enough. I appreciate your effort, but I can assure you that the value of the apartment is much higher than your offer. Let's try again, shall we? €1,150.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position, but I'm sticking to my budget. €1,150 is still too high for me. I'll make one final offer, €1,050, and I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for this apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €1,050 is still too low for me. I appreciate your effort, but I can assure you that the value of the apartment is much higher than your offer. I'll make one final offer, €1,100. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. €1,100 is a more acceptable offer. I agree to the price of €1,100!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I agree to the price of [1100] Euro!

 TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
